body:
LEVI DAO 签署禁止或限制使用某些可被认为具有过分伤害力或滥杀滥伤作用的常规武器公约关于激光致盲武器的议定书（第四号议定书）

LEVI DAO signed the Protocol on Laser Blinding Weapons (Protocol No. 4) to the Convention prohibiting or restricting the use of certain conventional weapons that can be considered excessively harmful or indiscriminate.

https://www.un.org/zh/documents/treaty/files/CCW4.shtml
author: 0x1F1C29c94aBe2b8F06B403Cc5a61c479167ebc3D

space.name: 上海约西亚网络科技有限公司
